participant_1.background:
I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym.
i drive a blue honda civic.
i have a set of identical twin brothers.
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.

participant_2.background:
I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.
my family hates my fiancé.
i live with my parents and my little brother.
I like to pet my cat to relieve stress and forget about the day.
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.

content.text: What's your favorite way to relieve stress?
I like to pet my cat. I've had her since I was 5 and she's really calming.
I can see that. Cats are great listeners. What's the best advice you've ever received?
My mom always told me to never give up on my dreams. She's the most supportive person I know.
That's great advice. I'm glad you have a good support system. What's your favorite way to spend a rainy day?
I like to curl up with a good book and a cup of tea. Or I'll play video games.
I'm more of a movie person myself, but I do enjoy a good book every now and then. What are you reading right now?
I'm reading the Wheel of Time series. I'm on book six and I'm really enjoying it.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's really long, but it's worth it.
I'm not afraid of a little commitment. I'll see if my library has it.
I'm sure they do. It's a pretty popular series.
Good to know. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk books.
Me too. I think we're going to get along just fine.
